title: Your servers are going up shit creek
body:
In game with some 40-80 MS and lagging like a kid with a seizure.

Even in the store I can see the lag happening, not good.

EDI: Scratch that last comment, it is lagging EVERYWHERE in the client.

replies.body:
i have 160-170 ping i dont even have any problems playing. maybe i get used to it
{{champion:75}}
At a constant ping it is good, in that game our Diana and myself were constantly DC at low ping, that tells me there were server issues at the time.

Hey,

Might be worth throwing your game log into [logs of lag](http://logsoflag.com/) - it can help you see if there were network issues at the time.

Cheers!
Mindstar

http://logsoflag.com/#_1OKkXHko7g

So what can this tell you exactly? Every other log I put there tells me I had a good network, no lost packets, no ping spikes.

In that game even Diana was DC at times, so it wasn't just me. I have never experienced this before.

Thanks.  

It is helpful to see because it shows what _kind_ of issue was occuring.   The strong red bars mean that you were seeing packet loss at those times.  It means your game traffic is being interrupted somewhere in between the game server and your PC (or even within your PC.  Ideally you never want to see that.

There are potentially many causes, but from the log it looks like a network link was briefly overloaded or failed.  It could be anything from a home router to a backbone link from your ISP to Riot.  I checked if there was anything strange going on with our servers at that time, but there wasn't any sign of issues .  Based on that, I'd suspect it is somewhere within your ISP or the connection from them to Riot.

It would be interesting to see if the Diana's logs show issues at the same time within the game.  Are you and Diana on the same ISP?

Cheers
Mindstar
Unfortunately Diana and I do not know each other, we both just complained about DCing at the time this occurred.
Talk shit about league and they fuck with your client, seriously.
